transcript:
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Hello? Haan ji?
Executive: Haan ji sir, Madhiya bol rahi hu India Mart head office se.
Customer: Haan ji boliye madam.
Executive: Sir kal maine aapko backend team se call karai thi toh aapne aaj unhe 10:30 ke baad ka time diya tha, hai na?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Toh phir aapki baat hui kisi se?
Customer: Nahi, abhi nahi hui.
Executive: Main bolu unko aapko call karne ke liye? Aap free hai abhi?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Ah, theek hai, main unko bolti hu aapko connect karenge, theek hai?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aap unka call receive kar lijiyega.
Customer: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Whether the customer received a call from the backend team.



Resolution:

- The executive offered to have the backend team call the customer.



Next Steps: 

- The executive will ask the backend team to connect with the customer, and the customer will receive the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

backend team, call
